author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Major Shareholders Trim Their Stake In KBJ
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - KBJ SA:
* KBJ CEO, ARTUR JEDYNAK, AND OTHER MEMBERS OF MANAGEMENT BOARD, MAREK WEIGT AND LUKASZ KROTOWSKI SELL 70,000 OF THE COMPANYâ€™S SHARES EACH FOR 9.5 ZLOTY PER SHARE
* THE NUMBER OF SHARES IN FREE FLOAT HAS BEEN INCREASED TO 24.34 PCT FROM 10.71 PCT
* MAREK WEIGT REDUCES STAKE IN CO TO 24.9 PCT FROM 29.44 PCT
* SHARES HAVE BEEN SOLD TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
